Detailed Description

Simple interface for a structured document.

Document is container of the pages. A page is the owner of the content.

virtual istd::IChangeable* idoc::IMultiPageDocument::InsertPage ( const QString &  pageTitle = QString(),
const QSizeF &  pageSize = QSizeF(),
int  position = -1 
) [pure virtual]

Insert a new document page at the given position.

Parameters:
pageTitle- Title of the page.
pageSize- Physical dimension of the page in mm.
Insertionposition in the page container. If this value is negative, the new page will be inserted after the last page of the document.

Implemented in iimg::CBitmapDocument.
